trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around August 7th 2007
divs: sighting detailsi had been observing the moon's occultation of the pleiades when i decided to take a look at mars which was positioned just a few degrees west of the moon. i had heard that mars was experiencing a planet-wide dust storm and just wanted to see if its relative brightness had changed very much. i had just gotten the planet focused when a gun-metal grey cylinderical object passed from west to east directly below the image of mars. probably 1\2" below the planet in relative terms. it took the object about 3 seconds to cross my field of view and unfortunately i couldn't track it any further. the object had no lights so i'm certain it wasn't an aircraft. of course, it could have been a satellite but i don't know if they orbit in the part of the sky i was looking at. this took place around 4:00am.
